src:
Milošević podelio pohvale: Našu kontru ne može niko da brani
Trebala nam je ovakva pobeda, konstatuje trener Partizana

02 Nov 2019

Pre četiri dana rafal kritika, danas pohvale. Kao što igre Partizana osciliraju tokom jesenjeg dela sezone, tako varira i raspoloženje Sava Miloševića od utakmice do utakmice.
Ovog puta njegov tim je zgromio Vojvodinu sa 4:0 usred Humske 1, uz jako dobru igru i dobro raspoloženu ofanzivnu liniju tima, zbog čega je trener crno-belih podelio pohvale pulenima.
Sve ono  što Milošević traži od svojih učenika, oni su to danas demonstrirali na terenu i zbog toga su dobili visoke ocene od svog trenera.„Sad moram da budem nedosledan sebi, nije trebalo da dođem pred novinare danas, da ne bi ispalo da dolazim samo kada pobeđujemo. Jako bitan trijumf za nas, posle svega što se dešavalo protiv Čukaričkog i povodom onog što dolazi. Trebala nam je ovakva pobeda, ovakav rezultat. Mi smo danas igrali derbi protiv jedne od najboljih ekipa u ligi, a partijom tokom svih 90 minuta smo pokazali da možemo. Čestitam momcima na reakciji, nadam se da nećemo ponovo poleteti“, rekao je Milošević posle meča.
Partizan je bez većih problema ove jeseni pobedio Crvenu zvezdu, Radnički i Vojvodinu, ali je gotovo sve bodove, osim od Čukaričkog, pogubio protiv, uslovno rečeno, slabijih ekipa, što je čudan kuriozitet za crno-bele.„Ako je to tačno, onda nam sledi pakao u narednih šest kola! Nadam se da ćemo izvući pouke, jer smo imali nedovoljno dobar voljni momenat na tim mečevima. Nema lakih utakmica u ligi, danas se videla razlika kako je kada uđemo maksimalno koncentrisani u utakmicu. Ali, ako za pet odsto spustimo taj nivo, onda imamo problem sa svima“.



Ono što je danas išlo na ruku Partizanu je relativno brzi gol, koji je njegovim igračima skinuo okove s nogu.„Ispada samo da je bilo lako, ali nije. Ipak, mi svaku utakmicu gde smo otvarali golom, bilo u domaćoj ligi ili Evropi, rešavali smo jednostavno. Našu kontru ne može niko da brani. Danas smo imali sreću da postignemo vodeći gol na vreme, otvorila nam se utakmica kako treba“.
Takuma Asano je odigrao još jednu utakmicu bez gola, Bibras Natho još jednu gde je zamenjen pre kraja...„Što se tiče Asana, doći će vreme i da postigne gol. A, Natha odmaram, jer je problem s njim i momcima koji igraju za reprezentacije da nemamo prostora da ih odmorimo kada i ostale. Natho je kapiten reprezentacije Izraela, u sledećoj prvenstvenoj pauzi će ponovo odigrati dve utakmice za državni tim. On ima veliki broj odigranih minuta otkako je došao i moramo da vodimo računa o tome“.
Naredni meč za Partizan je na – Old Trafordu. Mančester junajted je danas ponovo izgubio u prvenstvu. Još jednom će imati šansu da „okreće“ situaciju baš protiv crno-belih.„Nije dobro po nas što su izgubili“, nasmejao se Savo Milošević.
Foto: Starsport
text:
Milosevic shared praise: No one can defend our counter
We needed a win like this, Partizan coach notes

02 Nov 2019

Four days ago a burst of criticism, today praise. As the Partizan games fluctuate during the fall part of the season, so does Sava Milosevic's mood from match to match.
This time his team defeated Vojvodina by 4-0 in the middle of Humska 1, with a very good game and a well-placed offensive line of the team, which is why the black and white coach praised the Pulen.
All that Milosevic demands of his students, they demonstrated it on the field today, and because of that they received high marks from their coach. "Now I have to be inconsistent with myself; I did not have to come to the press today, so that I would not come just when we win. A very important triumph for us, after all that happened against Cukaricki and what was coming. We needed a win like this, a result like this. Today we played a derby against one of the best teams in the league, and with the game during the whole 90 minutes we showed that we can. Congratulations to the guys on the reaction, I hope we don't take off again, "Milosevic said after the match.
Partizan defeated Red Star, Radnicki and Vojvodina without major problems this fall, but almost all points, except for Cukaricki, scored against, conditionally, weaker teams, which is a strange curiosity for the black and white. "If this is true, then we are going to hell in the next six rounds! I hope we will draw lessons, because we had not enough goodwill moments in those matches. There are no easy matches in the league, today we can see the difference when we enter the most concentrated game. But if we lower that level by five percent, then we have a problem with everyone. "



What has come to the advantage of Partizan today is a relatively quick goal, which took his players off their shackles. "It just turns out it was easy, but it wasn't. However, we solved every game where we opened the goal, whether in the home league or Europe. No one can defend our counter. Today we were lucky to score the leading goal in time, the game opened properly. "
Takuma Asano played another goalless game, Bibras Natho one more where he was replaced before the end ... "As for Asano, it will be time to score. And, Natha, I'm resting, because the problem with him and the guys playing for the national teams is that we don't have space to rest them when the others are. Natho is the captain of the Israeli national team, in the next championship break he will again play two games for the national team. He has had a great number of minutes played since he came and we have to keep that in mind. "
Partizan's next match is at Old Traford. Manchester United lost the Championship again today. Once again, they will have a chance to “turn” the situation against the black and whites.
Photo: Starsport
